description: T.1 Cherry - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.2 Ash sapling - Fell.T.3 Holly sapling - Fell.T.4 Yew - Crown lift to 2.5m from ground level.T.5 Oak - Remove 2 low epicormic branches & remove 2 secondary branches over adjacent Yew.G.6 Holly sapling x3 - Fell.T.7 Sycamore - Fell.T.8 Elder x2 - Fell (exempt).T.9 Bay Laurel - Fell.T.10 Sycamore - Fell.G.1 Sycamore x5 - Fell.T.11 Apple - 1.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.12 Scarlet Oak - Fell.G.13 Holly sapling x3 - Fell.T.14 Sycamore - Fell (neighbours small woodland pollard on boundary with structural issues).
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
